content: 2 row down the next double_crochet of the round is made in the same fl a square with a slanted line to the upper lek double_crochet in the fl of the same st as the previous double_crochet was made in and skip the next st before making the next st let s read round 9 together number 9 is in a white square so round 9 is crocheted in background color a the first st of the round is a grey square with an x double_crochet in the fl of the chain 1 that is 2 rounds below next is a light green square single_crochet in the bl of the chain 1 of the previous round next a green square with an 0 chain 1 next another light green square single_crochet in the bl of the chain 1 of the previous round now reading to the lek there is another grey square with an x double_crochet in the same fl of the chain 1 as the previous double_crochet next are 4 squares with an x 3 blank squares a square with an x 3 blank squares and 4 squares with an x 4 double_crochet 3 single_crochet double_crochet 3 single_crochet 4 double_crochet the repeat ends at the light yellow square in round 9 the blank squares without an x are pink that doesn t mean they should be crocheted in color b a blank square is crocheted as a single_crochet in the color of the round no ma%er what the color of that square is in the chart crochet your square using the chart on page 4 and/or the wri%en instruchons hereaker © bokky square by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 5 the paaern round 1 a in a magic_ring chain 1 16 half_double_crochet close the round 16 half_double_crochet round 2 b remember the 1st st aler the ch1 is made in the next st remember the last st of the round is made in the same st as the starmng chain 1 was made in indicated in the photo below chain 1 single_crochet single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in the next st 2 single_crochet x 4 close the round 4 ch1-space 20 single_crochet round 3 a the fl to work the 1st double_crochet of this round before the corner in is indicated in the 1st photo below the double_crochet aler the corner is worked in the same fl as the double_crochet before the corner the loop in which to make the single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet is indicated in the 2nd photo below 1 complete repeat is shown in the 3rd photo below chain 1 double_crochet single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in the chain double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet x 4 close the round 4 ch1-space 12 single_crochet 16 double_crochet © bokky square by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 6 round 4 b for placement of single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet
